## OutputExpressions.ruleActivated property

[Common Expression Language](https://docs.cerbos.dev/cerbos/latest/policies/conditions) expression to evaluate when the policy rule is fully activated (action, roles, and derived roles match, and condition is met).

**Signature:**

```typescript
ruleActivated?: string | undefined;
```
